html: We must close loopholes in our background check system so that people cannot purchase a firearm unless they clear a background check. This will not restrict the rights of law-abiding citizens, it will prevent those seeking to harm others from accessing firearms. (3/4)

html: I am pleased that the House passed #RightToTry today, giving terminally ill patients the freedom to save their lives. This was a bipartisan cause and evidence that Republicans & Democrats can rally together to better the lives of our fellow Americans. #GiveThemHopepic.twitter.com/2i0fWF5EyO
text: I am pleased that the House passed #RightToTry today, giving terminally ill patients the freedom to save their lives. This was a bipartisan cause and evidence that Republicans & Democrats can rally together to better the lives of our fellow Americans. #GiveThemHopepic.twitter.com/2i0fWF5EyO

html: With the House's vote, both chambers have now showed that #RightToTry can pass with bipartisan support. I stand with my colleagues @RepAndyBiggsAZ & @SenRonJohnson in demanding that Right to Try – in any form – make it to the president’s desk to be signed into law.
text: With the House's vote, both chambers have now showed that #RightToTry can pass with bipartisan support. I stand with my colleagues @RepAndyBiggsAZ & @SenRonJohnson in demanding that Right to Try – in any form – make it to the president’s desk to be signed into law.

html: For those patients caught between the traditional drug approval delays, a clinical trial process for which they do not qualify & limited time, this #RightToTry simply establishes the freedom for patients to try therapies in situations where the benefits far outweigh the risks.
